attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2014-1137

Date: 2014-10-23

Whereas the Lewisporte Chamber of Commerce has applied, pursuant to section 4 of the Boards of Trade Act, to change the boundaries of its district from the town of Lewisporte to Norris Arm North, Norris Arm South, Lewisporte, Laurenceton, Porterville, Brown’s Arm, Stanhope, Embree, Little Burnt Bay, Michael’s Harbour, Campbellton, Comfort Cove-Newstead, Loon Bay, Baytona, Birchy Bay and Boyd’s Cove;

 

Therefore, His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Industry, pursuant to section 4 of the Boards of Trade Act, changes the boundaries of the district of the Lewisporte Chamber of Commerce from the town of Lewisporte to Norris Arm North, Norris Arm South, Lewisporte, Laurenceton, Porterville, Brown’s Arm, Stanhope, Embree, Little Burnt Bay, Michael’s Harbour, Campbellton, Comfort Cove-Newstead, Loon Bay, Baytona, Birchy Bay and Boyd’s Cove.


Attendu que la Lewisporte Chamber of Commerce a présenté une demande, en vertu de l’article 4 de la Loi sur les chambres de commerce, pour que les limites de son district, soit le village de Lewisporte, soient changées de façon à ce qu’elles correspondent au territoire de Norris Arm North, Norris Arm South, Lewisporte, Laurenceton, Porterville, Brown’s Arm, Stanhope, Embree, Little Burnt Bay, Michael’s Harbour, Campbellton, Comfort Cove-Newstead, Loon Bay, Baytona, Birchy Bay et Boyd’s Cove,

 

À ces causes, sur recommandation du ministre de l’Industrie et en vertu de l’article 4 de la Loi sur les chambres de commerce, Son Excellence le Gouverneur général en conseil change les limites du district de la Lewisporte Chamber of Commerce, soit le village de Lewisporte, pour qu’elles correspondent au territoire de Norris Arm North, Norris Arm South, Lewisporte, Laurenceton, Porterville, Brown’s Arm, Stanhope, Embree, Little Burnt Bay, Michael’s Harbour, Campbellton, Comfort Cove-Newstead, Loon Bay, Baytona, Birchy Bay et Boyd’s Cove.
